meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jay Singleton Kate La Rivière-Gagner Adam Elkana-Hale Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7000.

td.p: Jay Singleton, a high school government and social studies teacher from Waynesboro, Virginia
Kate La Rivière-Gagner, a fifth and sixth grade teacher from Starksboro, Vermont
Adam Elkana-Hale, a middle school math teacher from St. Louis, Missouri

tr.td: EUROPE IN LATIN
HOME FURNISHINGS
BAD POETRY ABOUT POETS
FROM BOOK TO FILM
AMERICANA
TIME FOR "T"

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Adam
Kate
Jay

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: And now, here are the other winners of these quarterfinal games this week...)
(Colin: Colin O\'Grady, Alexandria, Virginia.)
(Lydia: Lydia Cuffman, Redwood City, California.)
(Eric: Eric Hack, Cape Charles, Virginia.)
(Jennifer: Jennifer Giles, Longmont, Colorado.)
(Alex: Remember now, we have the four high scorers among non-winners. Here they are...)
(Erin: Erin McLaughlin, Queens, New York.)
(Mary: Mary Bayer, Hoffman Estates, Illinois.)
(Cathy: Cathy Farrell, Wyandotte, Michigan.)
(Alex: And one more, and that happens to be this lady here. Come on over, Kate.)
[Kate laughs.]
(Alex: Come on over. You\'re gonna play as a semifinalist next week.)
(Kate: Thank you so much.)
JayWhat is Italy Eng
$8,600
KateWhat is Italy?
$9,000
AdamWhat is Italy
$1,001
Italy')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'After England, more Shakespeare plays are set in this present-day country than in any other')

tr.td: SHAKESPEARE
After England, more Shakespeare plays are set in this present-day country than in any other
Adam
Kate
Jay
Automatic semifinalist
2nd place: $5,000 if eliminated
3rd place: $5,000 if eliminated
Adam
Kate
Jay

21 R
(including 1 DD),
3 W

16 R,
2 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
